section.p: The allows business users to view Data Quality reports and dashboards via a web interface.

ul.li: It is a web application and is accessed via a web browser.
There can be many instances of the , depending on business requirements.
Hosted on Tomcat only (can be same Tomcat as )
can install the and Tomcat (v6) together.
In addition to the relational database for the report data, an HSQL database is used for environment / user management.
The web application server is typically run as a Service / Daemon.

section.p:
The Talend DQ Data Mart is a database that holds the results of the execution of data quality reports. A data quality report can be executed directly from the
perspective, or within a data integration Job that executes a specified report.

ul.li: Only MySQL and Oracle databases are supported.
Small â€“ Medium size database: does not hold any actual source data.
Evolutionary Reports: all results from all report runs
Basic reports: last run of report
